text: Q23. | Station A needs to send a message consisting of 15 packets to Station B using a sliding window (window size 5) and Selective repeat error control strategy. All packets are ready and immediately available for transmission. If every 4th packet that A transmits gets lost (but no ACKs from B ever get lost), then what is the number of packets that A will transmit for sending the message to B? Solution: Window size=5 Total packets =19 Every 4t packet is lost. X X 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 x X 4, 9, 10, 11, 8, 12, 13, 14 11 15 14 Answer is 19 Total 19 packets a will transmit for sending message to b .
